description: Create a job production plan subscription

flags.name: --contact-method
flags.validation: One of: email_address, mobile_number. Example: email_address.

permissions: Admins can create. Non-admins can create if they are practically a member of the job customer or are a member of a material supplier associated with the job production plan.
side_effects: Creates a job production plan subscription record.
validation_notes: --job-production-plan and --user are required. contact-method, when provided, must be one of email_address or mobile_number. Server requires a contact method; if omitted, it is derived from the user default contact method. User must be contactable and must practically be a member of the customer or a related material supplier. User may only have one subscription per job production plan (unique user_id + job_production_plan_id).
